bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: The Division of Student Affairs at Radford University encompasses student housing, student conduct, Dean of Students office, disability resources, diversity and inclusion, student support services, substance abuse and violence intervention, student activities, student and fraternal organizations, student government, counseling, and health services.Student Affairs is guided by a set of shared values which are reflected in the conduct, programs, services, facilities, activities and organizations. Student Affairs pursues the mission and vision by keeping these values at the forefront in all that they do.

p.emph: The Goals of Student Affairs are:

blockquote.p: 1. Provide a diverse and distinctive Radford student experience.
2. Promote student development, retention, graduation and success
3. Provide safe, accessible, and inviting student-focused facilities that enhance student life

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Student Affairs Committee Records are a four box collection that span the years 1972-1980. Broadly the records include papers, committee notes, and other documents produced by the Student Affairs Committee and Student Affairs Council. The box descriptions can be seen in the arrangement note below.
